author: bayard
msg: Applying patch #17677. Remove the Writer API in favour of the PrintWriter API it is using elsewhere anyway - with the advantage that the IOException throws go away

author: bayard
msg: As #38845 states, three tests in this class fail. This is because they make assumptions about the default datetime formatting instances. I've made them non-default, which should allow tests to pass. Two do pass for me, but the third oddly enough doesn't - somehow it turns 23-Dec-2003 into 2003-12-22. Very odd.
This is an empty revision for padding.
